com.risk.model

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.model.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a high level class which contains continents and countries it manages most of the tasks regarding these classes, it hase several properties such as name, lands which is the collection of both countries and continents as well as connectivities which in this application is known as edge
    Author:
    Kourosh Aziz-Nejad
